title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Jul 28 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Jul 28 2021
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1: The battle lines are beginning to form: Governor DeSantis fights back against the CDC flipflop on mask mandate. St. Louis County voted 5-2 to end the mandate. Covid lockdowns and Democrats go hand-in-hand. Biden was for unmasking before he was for remasking. With media help, Fauci successfully completes another CYA. American citizens can't travel without a covid vaccine, but thousands of illegals cross the southern border every day. Clay has questions for Fauci: When will covid be over? When will I never have to see you on TV again? New covid variants are coming from other countries, not so much generating in the U.S.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
